Description: Laureate bust of Constantine to right, cuirassed. (obverse)
Two soldiers standing, facing one another, each holding reversed spear and resting hand on shield; between them, one standard. (reverse)
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Col Colin Mackenzie (?)
Bibliographic references: RIC7 / The Roman Imperial Coinage, vol. 7: Constantine and Licinius AD 313-337 (66, p.712)
Exhibition history: 2017, 18 Aug - 18 Nov, Museum Nan Eilean, Stornoway, Colin Mackenzie, Collector Extraordinaire
